meico.audio

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.audio.Audio

  • public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents audio data.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private byte[] audio 
      private java.io.File file 
      private javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Audio()
      constructor, generates empty instance
      Audio(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream inputStream)
      constructor with AudioInputStream
      Audio(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream inputStream, java.io.File file)
      this constructor reads audio data from the AudioInputStream and associates the file with it; the file may differ from the input stream
      Audio(byte[] audioData, javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format, java.io.File file)
      with this constructor all data is given explicitly
      Audio(java.io.File file)
      constructor; use this one to load and decode MP3 files

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] convertAudioInputStream2ByteArray(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream stream)
      convert an AudioInputStream to a byte array
      static javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream convertByteArray2AudioInputStream(byte[] array, javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format)
      convert a byte array (without audio file header, just pure audio data) into an AudioInputStream in a given AudioFormat
      static double[] convertByteArray2DoubleArray(byte[] array, javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format)
      This can be used to convert the byte array of an Audio object into an array of doubles between -1.0 and 1.0 which is far more convenient for audio analyses.
      static byte[] convertDoubleArray2ByteArray(double[] array)
      This method converts an input double array into a byte array.
      byte[] encodePcmToMp3(byte[] pcm, javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format)
      convert PCM encoded audio to MP3 encoding
      byte[] getAudio()
      a getter for the audio data
      byte[] getAudioAsMp3()
      returns audio data of this object as byte array MP3 encoded, the original data (this.getAudio() or this.audio) stay unaltered

      a getter for the number of channels

      • encodePcmToMp3

        public byte[] encodePcmToMp3(byte[] pcm,
                             javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format)
        convert PCM encoded audio to MP3 encoding
        Parameters:
        pcm - PCM data as byte array, this will be changes so be sure to call this method with a clone of the original if you want to keep the original
        format - audio format of PCM data
        Returns:
        mp3 data as byte array

      • getAudioAsMp3

        public byte[] getAudioAsMp3()
        returns audio data of this object as byte array MP3 encoded, the original data (this.getAudio() or this.audio) stay unaltered
        Returns:
        byte array of MP3 encoded audio data
